policies.description: A comprehensive crop insurance scheme that protects farmers against crop losses due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases throughout the crop cycle.
benefits: Affordable premiums (e.g., 2% for Kharif, 1.5% for Rabi)
Covers yield loss, post-harvest losses and localized calamities
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas
policies.application: Enroll through insurance providers or agriculture department

policies.description: Provides farmers with soil nutrient status information and fertilizer recommendations based on soil testing.
benefits: Recommendations to improve soil health and fertilizer usage
policies.application: Soil samples taken by agriculture department and card issued

policies.description: A scheme to improve irrigation coverage and promote efficient water usage through micro-irrigation and water conservation.
benefits: Improved water use efficiency and reduced dependency on monsoon

policies.description: Provides loans for building post-harvest infrastructure, supply chain facilities and other agricultural projects.
benefits: Support for warehousing, cold chains, processing units
policies.application: Submit proposal on the Agriculture Infrastructure Fund portal
